title: Remove mosque loudspeakers or we will play Hanuman Chalisa at a higher volume: Raj Thackeray at Mumbai rally - Times Now
content:
1. Remove mosque loudspeakers or we will play Hanuman Chalisa at a higher volume: Raj Thackeray at Mumbai rally  Times Now
  2. Will play Hanuman Chalisa in front of mosques if...: Raj Thackeray's warning  Hindustan Times
  3. Remove Loudspeakers In Mosques: Raj Thackeray To Maharashtra Government  NDTV
  4. 'Remove Loudspeakers from Mosques or Else...' Raj Thackeray Warns Maha Govt on 'Pakistan Supporters'  News18
  5. MNS chief Raj Thackeray tells Maharashtra govt to remove loudspeakers from mosques  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Speaking at a rally in Mumbai's Shivaji Park, Maharashtra Navnirman Sena chief Raj Thackeray on Saturday questioned the use of loudspeakers outside mosques. Calling for the practice to be stopped, he warned that this would be countered by speakers "outside mosques playing Hanuman Chalisa at higher volume". He also took swipes at Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray and the tri-party state government.
